categories.name: Phonetic Substitutions
categories.description: Spelling based on sound rather than convention

categories.name: Letter Omissions
categories.description: Missing letters, especially in double letter words

categories.name: Word Confusion
categories.description: Mixing up homophones and similar words

categories.name: Subject-Verb Agreement
categories.description: Mismatch between subject and verb form

categories.name: Article Errors
examples: I have cat/I have a cat

categories.name: Verb Tense Errors
examples: I walked and talk/I walked and talked

categories.name: Function Word Omission
examples: went the store/went to the store

categories.name: Word Order Errors
examples: I always am late/I am always late

categories.name: Run-On Sentences
categories.description: Two sentences joined without proper punctuation
examples: I ran home I was tired/I ran home. I was tired.

categories.name: Pronoun Case Errors
examples: give it to I/give it to me
